title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Medical Image Analysis Based on Near-Infrared Multispectral Imaging Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational optics theory and spectral analysis concept comprehension
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Explain fundamental principles of near-infrared hyperspectral imaging and analyze medical imaging applications
Experiment with metasurface-based wavelength separation technology via VR simulation and interpret results
Perform projects generating and evaluating hyperspectral images using 1150–1550nm near-infrared spectral data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
